entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
